name: cicd-utils
label: CICD Utils
description: CICD Utils provides out of the box actions for CICD solution pack

operations.title: Unzip Export Template
operations.description: Unzip the specified downloaded export template zip file

parameters.title: Filepath
parameters.name: filepath
parameters.description: Specify the export template zip file path on the filesystem

operations.title: Split Export Template
operations.description: Split the export template file into Production Content, Production Settings and Development Settings export template files

parameters.title: Prod Content Filepath
parameters.name: prod_content_filepath
parameters.placeholder: /tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Production Content.json
parameters.description: Specify the filepath of production content's export template, which you want to create in export template recordset
parameters.tooltip: Filepath under /tmp directory e.g. "/tmp/current_date/Source Control - Production Content/records/export_templates/Source Control - Production Content.json"

parameters.title: Prod Content JSON
parameters.name: prod_content_json
parameters.description: Specify the json of production content's export template, which you want to add in export template recordset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the json of production content's export template, which you want to add in export  template recordset
